Photo via Unsplash

Genesis v2.5.2 update, starter theme improvements, and a popular Genesis premium plugin is looking for a support specialist.

Genesis 2.5.1 / 2.5.2 update

First up this week, Genesis saw a bug fix update that saw it bumped first to v2.5.1 and then to v2.5.2.

#GenesisWP 2.5.1 is available for download.https://t.co/fTvyDMZtwU

— Nathan Rice (@nathanrice) June 8, 2017

Here’s what changed:

  • Fix issue with script loading logic.
  • Fix issue with Layout API fallback logic.
  • Fix issue with Layout API type priority determination.
  • Fix issue with posts not being excluded in Featured Posts widget.
  • Fix issue with entry attribute filter being applied to closing tag.
  • Fix issue with use of require by switching back to require_once.
  • Fix issue with method used for preventing entry attribute filter being applied to closing tag (Genesis 2.5.2)

Or for full details check out the official blog post.

Themes

Chris McIntosh has updated his Genesis starter theme, Bolt Pro.

Just updated Bolt Pro to be much less opinionated and more of a blank slate. #genesiswp Consistency from project to project has been awesome

— Chris Mcintosh (@akamac) June 10, 2017

And wants to know what you would like to see in future versions.

if there are things that you want in a #genesiswp starter theme let me know.

— Chris Mcintosh (@akamac) June 10, 2017

While Matt Whiteley would love to hear any suggestions you have for the Genesis child theme he’s building for freelancers.

Working on a #genesiswp Child Theme for freelancers. Any feature suggestions from the #freelancers out there. #WordPress

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) June 5, 2017

Calvin Koepke shares the latest update to his personal Genesis theme on GitHub.

Added the text-decoration-skip property to links on my site (sweet!). Grab 2.1.0 from @github here –> https://t.co/BtTtjAfegr #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/qwvV1rUV6b

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) June 5, 2017

Showcase

The new Monochrome Pro theme from StudioPress is already proving popular for showcase sites and Callia Web had done a great site based on it for helentarver.co.uk

Check out the website make-over we did for @HelenTWrites using the new Monochrome theme from StudioPress https://t.co/17Irrx0EMb #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/MkCnRiUzZu

— Callia Web (@CalliaWeb) June 6, 2017

Peter Shilling with a new site for humankindproject.org.au

New #WordPress site live just before the weekend https://t.co/hF2xDPieeK #GenesisWP https://t.co/gaS7xVSmkD

— Peter Shilling (@PShilling) June 9, 2017

Lauren Gray for bitzngiggles.com

One of our latest projects was this site refresh for @BitznGiggles. Love the fun, fresh look! #genesiswp https://t.co/5WFJSIeNS1 pic.twitter.com/2FK688ehyz

— Lauren Gray (@OnceCoupled) June 6, 2017

Best of the rest

Genesis plugin Design Palette Pro are looking for a new support specialist.

Hiring a new support specialist for @DesignPalette https://t.co/TGWidiJaJk via @post_status #wordpress #genesiswp

— Design Palette Pro (@DesignPalette) June 6, 2017

Davinder Singh launches new a content aggregation site for WordPress (powered by Genesis, of course), thewpdaily.com

My latest build – a content aggregation website for #WordPress users powered by a custom #genesiswp theme – https://t.co/C3gVIMcoOU

— Davinder Singh (@idavinder) June 5, 2017
